title: Kazakhstan national amateur boxing athletes
text:
<a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a> national amateur boxing athletes represents Kazakhstan in regional, <a href="Asian%20Games">continental</a> and <a href="Olympics">world</a> <a href="boxing">boxing</a> tournaments and matches sanctioned by the <a href="International%20Boxing%20Association%20%28amateur%29">International Boxing Association (AIBA)</a>.
Asian Games.
2006 Doha Asian Games.
10 amateur boxers represented Kazakhstan in this edition of the Asiad. This country is ranked 5th with a gold medal, two silver medals and three bronze medals.
